ssot__LoyaltyProgram__dlm.name: Loyalty Program
ssot__LoyaltyProgram__dlm.description: The Loyalty Program DMO represents a strategy designed to encourage customers to remain loyal to the business associated with the program.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.
